channel.title: [317] Need helping finding starting point cords[317]
channel.description:
what do i search to find the starting point of players? so i can change it.
Thanks, ElmosWorld

item.title: [317] Need helping finding starting point cords[317]
item.dc:creator: @ii_bandos_ii ii bandos ii
item.description:
@ii_bandos_ii wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:2, topic:386317”]Don’t use that method of checking administrator status if it’s not loading correctly. Instead, just use ‘playerRights’.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("mypos") && (playerRights > x)){ sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+""); }[/quote]

haha lol was about to post that but you were first } if(command.startsWith("mypos") && playerRights > 0){ sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+""); }

Read full topic
item.source: [317] Need helping finding starting point cords[317]

item.title: [317] Need helping finding starting point cords[317]
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Don’t use that method of checking administrator status if it’s not loading correctly. Instead, just use ‘playerRights’.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("mypos") && (playerRights > x)){ sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+""); }

Read full topic
